STATE
v.
ROBBS. No. COA08-621. Court of Appeals of North Carolina. Filed December 2, 2008. Certification Date December 22, 2008. Appeal from Buncombe (01CRS9787, 01CRS58967, 01CRS58968, 01CRS58969, 01CRS58970, 01CRS58971, 01CRS58972, 01CRS58973).
